org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation
[Groovy] Class LogOp

java.lang.Object
  org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.LogOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable
class LogOp

Gets a log of commits in the repository. Returns a list of Commits. Since a Git history is not necessarilly a line, these commits may not be in a strict order.

Get a full log of commits from the current HEAD and back.

 def history = grgit.log()

Get log of commits between two points.

 def history = grgit.log {
  range 'v1.0', 'v2.0'
 }

Get a list of the most recent 5 commits.

 def history = grgit.log(maxCommits: 5)

Get a log of commits skipping the most recent 3.

 def history = grgit.log(skipCommits: 3)
See git-log Manual Page.
See Also:
Since:
0.1.0
